description: A layer of chains magically laid over your spirit that adept mages manipulate to make themselves stronger. It is of the first and lowest order.
A layer of chains magically laid over your spirit that adept mages manipulate to make themselves stronger. It is of the first and lowest order. Wearing this one would be like searing your inner eye.
